articles.title: FBI part of 'coordinated U.S. government effort' to free US missionaries kidnapped in Haiti, White House says - USA TODAY
articles.description: Seventeen people – seven women, five men, five children, all Americans except one Canadian – were seized Saturday  in Haiti by a gang.

articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: America's factories were hurt by shortages of workers and supplies last month - CNN
articles.description: September was no easy month for America's factories. They struggled with shortages of materials and qualified workers plus the aftermath of Hurricane Ida, which battered the US gulf coast at the end of August.
